title: Sea passenger statistics: data tables (SPAS)
description: Data on UK international and domestic sea passengers, produced by Department for Transport.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll down to 'All UK international short sea, long sea and cruise passengers' and select the by direction monthly ODS file.   Although not specifically Covid-19 spreadsheet will allow the impact of the pandemic to be derived.
sizingNotes: Simple table structure with some footnotes
notes: Although not specifically Covid-19  the spreadsheet may allow the impact of the pandemic to be derived.
